# hashValue

**Instance Property**

The hash value for the payment error.

## Declaration

```swift
var hashValue: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Because hash values aren’t always equal across app executions, saving them for future execution isn’t reliable.





## Hashing

- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the payment error object by feeding the item into the given hasher.
